title: LEAGUE OF LEGEND: ERROR!?

embed.description: 1 points and 0 comments so far on reddit

body: Anyone else getting file error: #@#$! cuz its been happening frequent since the galio update? thanks.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body:
The actual error is that league has stopped working.  The fail to dump error is the messaging for the bugsplat error failing to get you details.  As you mention this being with the recent patch, it's possible that you have bad game files in addition to a possible connection issue with our services.  To start off, grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help repatch your game.

Test it out in a custom game, and if it continues then you'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  This will help rule out possibilities with how your network is reaching champion select followed by the game server.

Let me know if you have any questions!
